Ryan Bigg

Orchestrate

 06 Jun 2009

When I first begun working at Mocra, I worked on a project called Orchestrate with some awesome people like Jon Hicks, Jon Leighton and the Mocra crew. We launched Orchestrate to much fanfare in April. Orchestrate is a powerful project and task manager that's perfect for service and maintenance professionals.

Now Orchestrate has a new tour video done by Ian at ProCasts so go over there now and check it out and spread the word!
